clues.text: The jackal was called this big cat's "provider": it was thought to assist on hunts

(Jeff Probst, the host ofSurvivor, presents the clue.) The weather upped the stakes for "Survivor: Millennials vs. Gen X". The castaways had to be temporarily evacuated from their camps due toZena, this tropical storm that can also be called a hurricane or a typhoon
